subject: Re: JUnit Failure Trace not printed completely
msgSnippet: ... right side ... It doesn t help concerning width. After 240 characters the line is cropped. The rest of the line is not visible.
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Cox, Randy" <randy.cox@c...> wrote:
> I believe you can also press the filter stack trace button on the
right side
> of the runner and the entire trace appears in the window.
>
> Randy Cox


It doesn't help concerning width. After 240 characters the line is
cropped. The rest of the line is not visible.
